name: defra-swagger-hapi
description: A fork of swagger-hapi <https://github.com/apigee-127/swagger-hapi> compatible with hapi.js 17
author: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs <https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-environment-food-rural-affairs>

scripts.coverage: istanbul cover _mocha -- -u exports -R spec test test/lib
